perturbation.original_text:
VerticalNet shall provide or make available to PaperExchange, for use
in accordance with the provisions of this Agreement, (a) the full text of all
original content (headlines, feature articles, columns and case studies) created
from time to time by the Managing Editor of Pulp and Paper Online, and (b) the
content created from time to time by guest columnists for Pulp and Paper Online,
to the extent such columnists have approved the provision of such content by
VerticalNet to PaperExchange. VerticalNet shall provide such content (the
"VerticalNet Content") to PaperExchange twice per week, in two "batches" of the
VerticalNet Content created or acquired since the last provision of VerticalNet
Content by VerticalNet to PaperExchange.
perturbation.changed_text:
VerticalNet shall provide or make available to PaperExchange, for use
in accordance with the provisions of this Agreement, (a) the full text of all
original content (headlines, feature articles, columns and case studies) created
from time to time by the Managing Editor of Pulp and Paper Online, and (b) the
content created from time to time by guest columnists for Pulp and Paper Online,
to the extent such columnists have approved the provision of such content by
VerticalNet to PaperExchange. VerticalNet will distribute such content (the
"VerticalNet Information") to PaperExchange once per week, in a single transmission of the
VerticalNet Information created or acquired since the last provision of VerticalNet
Information by VerticalNet to PaperExchange.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'VerticalNet Content' is replaced with 'VerticalNet Information,' creating ambiguity as to whether these terms are interchangeable or refer to different types of content. Additionally, the delivery frequency is changed from 'twice per week' to 'once per week', contradicting the original agreement.

perturbation.original_text:
During the Term, VerticalNet shall not (a) act as an
advertising agent or representative for any PaperExchange Competitor and (b)
place any advertisements on Pulp and Paper Online from any PaperExchange
Competitor.
perturbation.changed_text:
During the Term, VerticalNet shall not (a) act as an
advertising representative for any PaperExchange Rival and (b)
place any advertisements on Pulp and Paper Online from any PaperExchange
Rival.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'PaperExchange Competitor' is replaced with 'PaperExchange Rival,' creating ambiguity as to whether these terms are interchangeable or refer to different types of entities. This could lead to disputes over which entities are considered restricted.

perturbation.original_text:
Each party hereby irrevocably waives all
rights a party may have to a trial by jury in any legal action or proceeding
arising out of or in connection with this Agreement or the transactions
contemplated hereby.
perturbation.changed_text:
Each party hereby irrevocably waives all
rights a party may have to a bench trial in any legal action or proceeding
arising out of or in connection with this Agreement or the transactions
contemplated hereby.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'trial by jury' is replaced with 'bench trial.' In a bench trial, a judge or panel of judges decide the case. It is in contrast to a jury trial, in which a jury decides the case. Since they are different, the contract will cause uncertainty in enforcement in legal actions, and whether a case should be judged with or without a jury.
